result.title: Report: Generic monitoring principle and equipment for TEMPO
result.description: A report containing a generic monitoring principle, which allow better comparison between the different demo sites. The report contains the monitoring equipement to be used, as well as the choice of performance indicators and the respective calculation methods, the definition of system boundaries, monitoring frequency, storage and transfer (correct format) of the monitoring data to AIT.
